message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $180.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $180 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $180 might be a bit high, but I still think the product is worth more than $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $160.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $160 is still a bit outside my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $130.  Let's see if we can find a solution.
I understand that $160 might be a bit high, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $130. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $145.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $145 is still a little too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $135.  Let's see if we can make this work.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $140.
Alice,  I understand your concern, but $140 is still a bit high for me. Let's try $137.50. I'm hoping we can close this deal.
I'm not willing to go as low as $137.50, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll offer it to you for $142.50.
